abstract: The British Columbia Securities Commission on Wednesday dismissed Carl C. Icahn’s request get a temporary cease-trade order against Lions Gate Entertainment and funds controlled by one of its board members, Mark Rachesky.
snippet: The British Columbia Securities Commission on Wednesday dismissed Carl C. Icahn’s request get a temporary cease-trade order against Lions Gate Entertainment and funds controlled by one of its board members, Mark Rachesky.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has lost a round in his battle for control of Lions Gate Entertainment.

headline.main: Icahn Loses a Fight Over Lions Gate in Canada
